doc:
Gregg Berger https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gregg_Berger 0 Greggory Berger is an American voice actor known for his roles as Jecht from Final Fantasy X and the Dissidia Final Fantasy games, Grimlock from The Transformers, Mysterio and Kraven the Hunter from Spider-Man, Cornfed Pig from Duckman, Agent Kay from Men in Black: The Series, The Gromble from Aaahh!!! Real Monsters, Captain Blue from Viewtiful Joe, Eeyore from Kingdom Hearts II, Hunter the Cheetah and Ripto from Spyro The Dragon, and The Thing from Marvel: Ultimate Alliance. Greggory_Berger is an_American_voice_actor known for his_roles as Jecht from Final_Fantasy_X and the_Dissidia_Final_Fantasy_games , Grimlock from The_Transformers , Mysterio and Kraven the_Hunter from Spider-Man , Cornfed_Pig from Duckman , Agent_Kay from Men in Black : The_Series , The_Gromble from Aaahh !!! Real_Monsters , Captain_Blue from Viewtiful_Joe , Eeyore from Kingdom_Hearts_II , Hunter the_Cheetah_and_Ripto from Spyro The_Dragon , and The_Thing from Marvel : Ultimate_Alliance .
